get.summary: Returns collection of products.
get.description:
Sample requests:

    GET /products?$filter=ResourceType eq 'Application' or ResourceType eq 'SoftwareAsAService' 
    GET /products?$filter=ExternalIDs/Any(i:i/Type eq 'StoreID' and i/Value eq '{storeID}')
    GET /products?$filter=ExternalIDs/Any(i:i/Type eq 'ExternalAzureProductID' and i/Value eq '{externalAzureProductID}')

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter for paged collection. Filter by ResourceType or ExternalIDs with operation eq is allowed.

get.summary: Returns a product.
Returns ProductSetup of a Product.
Returns a paged collection of Branch
get.description:
Sample request:
                 GET /products/{productID}/branches/getByModule(module=Listing)
                     => returns all branches of Listing module

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Module. Possible values: Listing, Package, Property, Availability

200.description: A PagedCollection of complete submission resource
